MEDIA_LOG: [COMPLETED]

[BOOKS_READ]

Neuromancer

[★★★★★]

The book that started it all. A must-read for any cyberpunk fan. The prose is dense but rewarding.

The Cuckoo's Egg

[★★★★☆]

A true story that reads like a thriller. The early days of cyber-sleuthing are fascinating.

Ghost in the Wires

[★★★★★]

Mitnick's story is a masterclass in social engineering. A reminder that the human element is often the weakest link.

[GAMES_COMPLETED]

Cyberpunk 2077

[★★★★☆]

A flawed masterpiece. The world-building is second to none, even if the launch was rocky. The story is unforgettable.

Deus Ex: Human Revolution

[★★★★★]

The gold standard for immersive sims. The level of player choice is incredible. I never asked for this, but I'm glad I got it.

System Shock (Remake)

[★★★★☆]

A faithful and tense remake of a classic. SHODAN is still one of the greatest villains in gaming history.
